alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 24 at 1:42PM CST until February 26 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Red River At Port Royal affecting Robertson and Montgomery Counties. For the Red River...including Port Royal...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Red River At Port Royal. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 18.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 745 AM CST.
